discovery_summary: Comprehensive CRM system discovery completed. 29 requirements identified across 6 semantic chunks. 6 reusable patterns from codebase (scored 7-9/10) and 4 new patterns needed. System architecture designed with 5 new files, 7 integration points, and backward-compatible database extensions. Form integration via localStorage + URL parameters. Estimated 40 tasks, 2-3 hours, moderate complexity. 6 gaps identified with recommendations (not blocking). Ready for Planning workflow.

goal_alignment.assessment: Discovery maintains focus on original goal: comprehensive CRM system for customer management, lead tracking, disposition management, and reporting with KPIs. All aspects addressed.
